title: NFC not working
content:
Hi.

NFC was working on my device and I was able to read/write to NFC stickers without issue.
Suddenly though it is no longer working. Google Pay continues to work fine however.

When I now try to scan an NFC tag I just get no response from my phone and I've tried several apps to try reading the data.

Steps I've tried so far:

- Restarting phone. I have also gone into safe mode which doesn't resolve the issue.
- Uninstalling all third party NFC apps
- Turning off Android Beam
- Checking NFC is enabled in settings
- Removing the case (though it was scanning with the case on before anyway)

Ideally I don't want to factory reset as this is hassle. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.
